author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this zero-dependency package will provide a browser-compatible version of the uglifyjs v1.3.5 javascript-minifier
name: uglifyjs-lite

scripts.publish-alias: for ALIAS in uglify-lite; do shNpmPublish uglifyjs-lite $ALIAS; done
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover test.js
scripts.test: export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test test.js
